bibl.title: Cleopatra and Egypt.
bibl.note: Foreword. - Acknowledgements. - 1. Cleopatra - Black and Beautiful? - 2. Sources. - 3. King's Daughter, King's Sister, Great Royal Wife. - 4. Ruler, Regent, and Pharaoh. - 5. Cleopatra's Capital and Court. - 6. Cleopatra as a Goddess. - 7. Cleopatra, Mark Antony, and the East. - 8. Death of a Queen, Rebirth of a Goddess. - 9. The Legacy of Cleopatra. - Bibliography. Index.
Malden, Mass., Blackwell, 2008, 8°, xiii-219 pp., 2 arbres généal., 42 figg. ISBN 978-1-4051-1389-2 (hbk) / 978-1-4051-1390-8 (pbk). $79.95 (hbk) / $29.95 (pbk).
